custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM User_ LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountUserRel ON CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountUserId = User_.userId LEFT JOIN Users_Orgs ON Users_Orgs.userId = User_.userId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org1 ON Org1.organizationId = Users_Orgs.organizationId LEFT JOIN Organization_ Org2 ON (Org1.treePath IS NOT NULL) AND (Org2.treePath LIKE CONCAT(Org1.treePath, '%')) LEFT JOIN CommerceAccountOrganizationRel ON CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.organizationId = Org2.organizationId LEFT JOIN CommerceAccount ON (CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccountUserRel.commerceAccountId) OR (CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccountOrganizationRel.commerceAccountId) WHERE [$PARENT_ACCOUNT_ID$] (User_.userId = [$USER_ID$]) AND (CommerceAccount.type_ != 0) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccount.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
